page.title: 16CARNIVAL PERSONALITY
page.content: {Lady Foxwell,}whose country house is on the fringe of Sherston, has, by her many connections with the Entertain_ ment Industry, provided the village with a steady supply of{well known {"personalities" for their Carnival}day festivities. Famous actors, actresses and pop_stars have appeared to crown the Carnival Queen and to take part in the day's activities,{at no expense to the {village}(and this when appearance fees begin at Â£250). The suspense of wondering who will come to join the colourful and sophisticated house parties of dancers and singers of {international fame}provide a focus of interest which adds greatly to the crowd pulling appeal of the Carnival & is a talking point for the village for many weeks afterwards.
